data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
In the minute 2, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim signals a throw-in for Busan, close to Seoul's area.
In the minute 8, Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
Throw-in Busan.
In the minute 10, Throw-in for Busan in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Seoul have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 13, Goal kick for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Busan are pushing forward but Romulo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 14, Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Yong-woo Kim signals a Seoul throw-in in Busan's half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Seoul close to the penalty box.
In the minute 18, Corner awarded to Seoul.
Throw-in for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 20, In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Seoul's Kim Won-sik breaks free at World Cup Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Yong-woo Kim awards Busan a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Yong-woo Kim awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Seoul take a 1-0 lead thanks to Dostonbek Tursunov.
In the minute 25, Park Chu-young with an assist there.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
In the minute 28, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Seoul's Kim Won-sik gets in a shot on goal at World Cup Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Busan in the half of Seoul.
In the minute 31, Seoul to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
Free kick in a good position for Seoul!
Park Jong-woo (Busan) has received a yellow card from Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 36, Seoul surge into the attack at World Cup Stadium but Young Sun Yun’s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Park Chu-young for Seoul drives towards goal at World Cup Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 36, Seoul's Park Chu-young misses with an attempt on goal.
Yong-woo Kim awards Busan a goal kick.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 38, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
Free kick Busan.
In the minute 41, Busan attack but Kwon Yong-hyun's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 43, Busan have a goal kick.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Seoul in their own half.
In Seoul a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 45, Kim Seung-jun for Busan is back on the field again.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Seoul.
In the minute 45, Throw-in high up the field for Seoul in Seoul.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 45, Attention is being given to Busan’s Kim Seung-jun and play has been suspended briefly.
Kim Won-sik (Seoul) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Yong-woo Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Busan drive forward but Kwon Yong-hyun is judged offside.
Busan are coming forward and Lee Dong-jun gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 52, Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
Seoul have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Busan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Seoul in the half of Busan.
Can Busan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seoul's half?
Romulo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Busan.
In the minute 56, Busan have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
Romulo of Busan gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
In the minute 58, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seoul.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seoul.
Busan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Corner awarded to Seoul.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
The away team replace Kim Seung-jun with Kim Byong-oh.
Seoul make their first substitution with Sung-Yueng Ki replacing Kim Won-sik.
Seoul have a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Yong-woo Kim awards Seoul a goal kick.
Free kick for Busan in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Seoul in the half of Busan.
Busan needs to be cautious. Seoul have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 74, Can Seoul capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Busan's half?
Duk-Jae Cho is making the team's second substitution at World Cup Stadium with Jeong Seong-min replacing Kwon Yong-hyun.
Free kick Seoul.
Seoul's Han Seung-gyu gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 75, Goal kick for Busan at World Cup Stadium.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan.
In Seoul Seoul attack through Sung-Yueng Ki. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Seoul.
Ball goes out of play for a Seoul goal kick.
Seoul to take a throw-in in Busan territory.
In the minute 82, Goal kick for Seoul at World Cup Stadium.
Kim Jung-hyun is on a sub for Park Jong-woo for Busan.
Kim Ho-young (Seoul) is making a second substitution, with Kim Jin-ya replacing Jo Yeong-uk.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Busan in the half of Seoul.
Seoul awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Busan have been awarded a corner by Yong-woo Kim.
In the minute 85, Goal! Kim Jung-hyun (Busan) levels the score at 1-1 with a header in Seoul.
Great play from Romulo to set up the goal.
Seoul awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Seoul in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Yun Ju-tae is replacing Yo-Han Go for the home team.
Corner awarded to Busan.
At World Cup Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Seoul in their own half.
Throw-in Busan.
Busan drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Can Seoul get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Busan's half?
Yong-woo Kim signals a free kick to Busan in their own half.
It's 1-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
